mapper.select: select user_id userId, order_id orderId, goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, goods_count goodsCount, the_goods_all_price theGoodsAllPrice, goods_price goodsPrice from t_info_order_deepen where order_id = #{orderId} and is_deleted = 0

select a.order_id orderId, a.order_all_cost orderAllCost, a.order_state orderStateId, a.store_id storeId, a.user_name userName, a.phone phone, a.pay_time payTime, a.version from t_info_order a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and a.order_id like concat('%', #{orderId}, '%')
and a.order_state like concat('%', #{orderStateId}, '%')
and a.pay_time >= #{payTimeStart}
and a.pay_time <= #{payTimeEnd}
order by create_time desc

select a.order_id orderId, a.order_all_cost orderAllCost, a.order_state orderStateId, a.store_id storeId, a.user_name userName, a.phone phone, a.pay_time payTime, a.version from t_info_order a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.store_id in ( select store_id from t_info_store where user_id = #{createBy} )
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and a.order_id like concat('%', #{orderId}, '%')
and a.order_state like concat('%', #{orderStateId}, '%')
and a.pay_time >= #{payTimeStart}
and a.pay_time <= #{payTimeEnd}
order by a.create_time desc

update.foreach: update t_info_order set order_state = #{item.orderStateId}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{item.userCode}, version = version + 1 where order_id = #{item.orderId} and version = #{item.version}
